item.title: Why UK investors are backing British stocks in 2026
item.description: The UK stock market may be lacking fashionable technology shares but investors are keen to buy British next year

item.title: UK inflation live: did inflation fall in November?
item.description: The ONS releases inflation data for November tomorrow (17 December). Has inflation continued its downward trend?

item.title: Should you invest in biotech?
item.description: Healthcare and biotech stocks offer tempting valuations following years in the doldrums

item.title: How to limit how much of your Christmas bonus goes to the taxman
item.description: It's Christmas bonus season but the boosted pay packet may mean much of your hard-earned reward ends up with HMRC instead of in your pocket

item.title: High earners face £15k income hit by 2029 following Autumn Budget
item.description: Rachel Reeves’s Autumn Budget means high earners – or HENRYs – are now looking at an income hit running into the thousands. Can you avoid it?
